Control Category.name: Financial Reporting
Control Category.description: Controls over financial statement assertions

Control Category.name: Operations
Control Category.description: Controls over business operations

Control Category.name: Compliance
Control Category.description: Controls over regulatory compliance

Control Category.name: IT General Controls
Control Category.description: Technology and system controls

Control Category.name: Entity Level Controls
Control Category.description: Organization-wide controls

Control Category.name: Revenue Recognition
Control Category.description: Controls ensuring revenue is recorded in accordance with accounting standards

Control Category.name: Expense Management
Control Category.description: Controls over expense recording, approval, and classification

Control Category.name: Treasury & Cash Management
Control Category.description: Controls over cash, banking, and treasury operations

Control Category.name: Bank Reconciliation
Control Category.description: Controls ensuring bank accounts are properly reconciled

Control Category.name: Payment Processing
Control Category.description: Controls over payment authorization and execution

Control Category.name: Accounts Receivable
Control Category.description: Controls over customer billing, collections, and AR aging

Control Category.name: Credit Management
Control Category.description: Controls over customer credit limits and terms

Control Category.name: Accounts Payable
Control Category.description: Controls over vendor payments and AP processing

Control Category.name: Invoice Processing
Control Category.description: Controls over vendor invoice receipt and approval

Control Category.name: Fixed Assets
Control Category.description: Controls over asset capitalization, depreciation, and disposal

Control Category.name: Inventory & Cost of Sales
Control Category.description: Controls over inventory valuation and COGS calculation

Control Category.name: Payroll
Control Category.description: Controls over employee compensation and payroll processing

Control Category.name: Tax Compliance
Control Category.description: Controls over tax calculation, reporting, and filing

Control Category.name: Intercompany Transactions
Control Category.description: Controls over intercompany billing, transfers, and eliminations

Control Category.name: Period-End Close
Control Category.description: Controls over month-end and year-end closing procedures

Control Category.name: Journal Entries
Control Category.description: Controls over manual journal entry preparation and approval

Control Category.name: Segregation of Duties
Control Category.description: Controls ensuring proper separation of incompatible functions

Risk Category.name: Financial Reporting Risk
Risk Category.description: Risks related to material misstatement in financial statements

Risk Category.name: Revenue Misstatement
Risk Category.description: Risk of incorrect revenue recognition or timing

Risk Category.name: Expense Misclassification
Risk Category.description: Risk of expenses recorded in wrong period or category

Risk Category.name: Asset Misappropriation
Risk Category.description: Risk of theft or misuse of company assets

Risk Category.name: Financial Statement Fraud
Risk Category.description: Risk of intentional misstatement of financial results

Risk Category.name: Liquidity Risk
Risk Category.description: Risk of insufficient cash to meet obligations

Risk Category.name: Credit Risk
Risk Category.description: Risk of customer non-payment or default

Risk Category.name: Regulatory Compliance Risk
Risk Category.description: Risk of non-compliance with financial regulations

Risk Category.name: Tax Risk
Risk Category.description: Risk of tax penalties or unexpected liabilities

Risk Category.name: System Failure Risk
Risk Category.description: Risk of financial system downtime or data loss

Risk Category.name: Vendor Risk
Risk Category.description: Risk related to third-party vendor performance

Risk Category.name: Currency Risk
Risk Category.description: Risk from foreign exchange rate fluctuations

Risk Category.name: Interest Rate Risk
Risk Category.description: Risk from changes in interest rates affecting borrowing costs

COSO Principle.name: bforcvnqa1
COSO Principle.title: Commitment to Integrity and Ethical Values
COSO Principle.description: The organization demonstrates a commitment to integrity and ethical values.

COSO Principle.name: bg0vnng8o9
COSO Principle.title: Board Independence and Oversight
COSO Principle.description: The board of directors demonstrates independence from management and exercises oversight.

COSO Principle.name: bg11g7evve
COSO Principle.title: Management Structure and Authority
COSO Principle.description: Management establishes structures, reporting lines, and appropriate authorities.

COSO Principle.name: bg1ji89c8u
COSO Principle.title: Commitment to Competence
COSO Principle.description: The organization demonstrates a commitment to attract, develop, and retain competent individuals.

COSO Principle.name: bg242mpqsk
COSO Principle.title: Accountability
COSO Principle.description: The organization holds individuals accountable for their internal control responsibilities.

COSO Principle.name: bg3f3ub59l
COSO Principle.title: Specify Suitable Objectives
COSO Principle.description: The organization specifies objectives with sufficient clarity to enable identification of risks.

COSO Principle.name: bg357rn8ag
COSO Principle.title: Identify and Analyze Risk
COSO Principle.description: The organization identifies risks to the achievement of objectives and analyzes risks.

COSO Principle.name: bg3agpf5rl
COSO Principle.title: Assess Fraud Risk
COSO Principle.description: The organization considers the potential for fraud in assessing risks.

COSO Principle.name: bg3q5mobh8
COSO Principle.title: Identify and Analyze Significant Change
COSO Principle.description: The organization identifies and assesses changes that could significantly impact internal control.

COSO Principle.name: bg342f6lrj
COSO Principle.title: Select and Develop Control Activities
COSO Principle.description: The organization selects and develops control activities that contribute to risk mitigation.

COSO Principle.name: bg3pl881f4
COSO Principle.title: Technology General Controls
COSO Principle.description: The organization selects and develops general control activities over technology.

COSO Principle.name: bg3armtdkj
COSO Principle.title: Deploy Through Policies and Procedures
COSO Principle.description: The organization deploys control activities through policies and procedures.

COSO Principle.name: bg4qkhhi66
COSO Principle.title: Use Relevant Information
COSO Principle.description: The organization obtains, generates, and uses relevant quality information.

COSO Principle.name: bg44smssug
COSO Principle.title: Internal Communication
COSO Principle.description: The organization internally communicates information necessary for internal control.

COSO Principle.name: bg4dne9cs1
COSO Principle.title: External Communication
COSO Principle.description: The organization communicates with external parties regarding internal control matters.

COSO Principle.name: bg59sa5nn0
COSO Principle.title: Conduct Ongoing and Separate Evaluations
COSO Principle.description: The organization selects, develops, and performs ongoing and/or separate evaluations.

COSO Principle.name: bg5eki0pgo
COSO Principle.title: Evaluate and Communicate Deficiencies
COSO Principle.description: The organization evaluates and communicates internal control deficiencies timely.

Control Activity.name: 1o6901cmcb
Control Activity.description: Monthly review of revenue transactions to ensure compliance with ASC 606 revenue recognition criteria. Includes verification of performance obligations, transaction price, and timing.
Control Activity.control_procedure:
1. Extract revenue transactions for the period
2. Review for proper revenue recognition timing
3. Verify performance obligations are met
4. Confirm transaction prices are accurate
5. Document exceptions and follow up
Control Activity.evidence_requirements: Revenue register, supporting contracts, delivery confirmations

Control Activity.name: 1olh5fv3rm
Control Activity.description: All sales invoices above $10,000 require manager approval before posting. System enforces approval workflow.
Control Activity.control_procedure:
1. Sales invoice created by billing team
2. System routes invoices >$10K for approval
3. Manager reviews and approves/rejects
4. Approved invoices auto-post to GL
Control Activity.evidence_requirements: Approval workflow logs, system configuration

Control Activity.name: 1oo7crmjod
Control Activity.description: Credit memos require dual approval - sales manager and finance controller - before processing.
Control Activity.control_procedure:
1. Credit memo request submitted with justification
2. Sales manager reviews and approves
3. Finance controller reviews and approves
4. Credit memo processed and posted
Control Activity.evidence_requirements: Credit memo forms, approval signatures, supporting documentation

Control Activity.name: 1op6h5i5h1
Control Activity.description: Monthly bank reconciliations prepared by accountant and reviewed by controller within 5 business days of month-end.
Control Activity.control_procedure:
1. Download bank statements on 1st business day
2. Import transactions into reconciliation tool
3. Match transactions with GL entries
4. Investigate and clear reconciling items
5. Controller reviews and signs off
Control Activity.evidence_requirements: Bank statements, reconciliation reports, sign-off documentation

Control Activity.name: 1opq2m1kji
Control Activity.description: Review of checks outstanding more than 90 days with follow-up and escheatment processing as required.
Control Activity.control_procedure:
1. Generate outstanding check report
2. Identify checks >90 days old
3. Contact payees for status
4. Process escheatment if required
5. Document resolution
Control Activity.evidence_requirements: Outstanding check report, correspondence, escheatment filings

Control Activity.name: 1orq9l5hg4
Control Activity.description: All payment batches require dual authorization before release. Treasury manager and CFO approval required for batches over $100,000.
Control Activity.control_procedure:
1. AP creates payment batch
2. Treasury manager reviews and approves
3. Batches >$100K routed to CFO
4. Approved batches released to bank
Control Activity.evidence_requirements: Payment batch reports, approval logs, bank confirmations

Control Activity.name: 1osqhr6ui5
Control Activity.description: Daily transmission of positive pay file to bank for check fraud prevention. Exceptions reviewed within 24 hours.
Control Activity.control_procedure:
1. System generates positive pay file after check run
2. File transmitted to bank automatically
3. Bank matches presented checks against file
4. Exceptions emailed to treasury team
5. Treasury reviews and approves/rejects exceptions
Control Activity.evidence_requirements: Transmission logs, exception reports, bank confirmations

Control Activity.name: 1ossgv2rfj
Control Activity.description: Automated three-way match of purchase order, goods receipt, and vendor invoice before payment approval.
Control Activity.control_procedure:
1. Vendor invoice received and scanned
2. System matches to open PO
3. System matches to goods receipt
4. Variances flagged for review
5. Matched invoices auto-approved
Control Activity.evidence_requirements: Match exception reports, system configuration, sample match documentation

Control Activity.name: 1ot90vcd8a
Control Activity.description: All vendor master data changes (especially bank details) require manager approval and callback verification.
Control Activity.control_procedure:
1. Change request submitted via workflow
2. Manager approves change request
3. AP team verifies via callback to known number
4. Change implemented and logged
5. Confirmation sent to vendor
Control Activity.evidence_requirements: Change request forms, callback logs, approval documentation

Control Activity.name: 1ovbg95ef2
Control Activity.description: System check for potential duplicate invoices based on vendor, amount, and invoice number before posting.
Control Activity.control_procedure:
1. Invoice entered into system
2. Duplicate check runs automatically
3. Potential duplicates flagged
4. AP reviews and confirms or releases
5. Clean invoices proceed to approval
Control Activity.evidence_requirements: Duplicate detection logs, exception reports

Control Activity.name: 1p08khk9j7
Control Activity.description: All manual journal entries require supporting documentation and approval based on amount thresholds.
Control Activity.control_procedure:
1. Journal entry prepared with description and support
2. System routes for approval based on amount:
   - <$10K: Accounting manager
   - $10K-$100K: Controller
   - >$100K: CFO
3. Approver reviews support and approves
4. Entry posted to GL
Control Activity.evidence_requirements: Journal entry forms, supporting documentation, approval logs

Control Activity.name: 1p138gh7vc
Control Activity.description: Quarterly review of all recurring journal entries to verify continued accuracy and appropriateness.
Control Activity.control_procedure:
1. Generate list of all recurring entries
2. Review each for continued appropriateness
3. Verify amounts are still accurate
4. Update or delete as needed
5. Document review and conclusions
Control Activity.evidence_requirements: Recurring entry listing, review documentation

Control Activity.name: 1p20e1ok4k
Control Activity.description: Controller reviews all journal entries posted in the close period to identify unusual or material items.
Control Activity.control_procedure:
1. Generate journal entry report for close period
2. Filter for entries above threshold
3. Review each entry for appropriateness
4. Follow up on unusual items
5. Sign off on review completion
Control Activity.evidence_requirements: Journal entry report, review sign-off, follow-up documentation

Control Activity.name: 1p3q3lpgo5
Control Activity.description: Capital expenditures require approval based on dollar thresholds and board approval for amounts over $500,000.
Control Activity.control_procedure:
1. Capital request submitted with justification
2. Routed for approval based on amount:
   - <$50K: Department head
   - $50K-$500K: CFO
   - >$500K: Board of Directors
3. Approved requests become authorized budget
4. Assets capitalized upon completion
Control Activity.evidence_requirements: Capital request forms, approval documentation, board minutes

Control Activity.name: 1p3lpsj3hs
Control Activity.description: Annual physical verification of all fixed assets with reconciliation to the fixed asset register.
Control Activity.control_procedure:
1. Generate fixed asset register
2. Perform physical count by location
3. Compare count to register
4. Investigate and resolve variances
5. Update register as needed
6. Document results and sign off
Control Activity.evidence_requirements: Count sheets, reconciliation documentation, variance analysis

Control Activity.name: 1p4q10ib8b
Control Activity.description: Quarterly review of user access to identify and remediate segregation of duties conflicts.
Control Activity.control_procedure:
1. Run SOD conflict report from system
2. Review identified conflicts
3. Validate compensating controls exist
4. Remediate conflicts where possible
5. Document exceptions with justification
Control Activity.evidence_requirements: SOD conflict report, remediation documentation, exception approvals

Control Activity.name: 1p5bfao5st
Control Activity.description: Quarterly review of user access to financial systems with certification by business owners.
Control Activity.control_procedure:
1. Generate user access reports for all financial systems
2. Distribute to business owners for review
3. Owners certify appropriate access
4. IT removes inappropriate access
5. Document completion
Control Activity.evidence_requirements: Access reports, certification forms, removal confirmations

Control Activity.name: 1p57cnmt6h
Control Activity.description: Monthly review of privileged user activities in financial systems to detect unauthorized changes.
Control Activity.control_procedure:
1. Extract privileged user activity logs
2. Review for unauthorized or unusual activities
3. Investigate anomalies
4. Report findings to IT security
5. Document review completion
Control Activity.evidence_requirements: Activity logs, review documentation, investigation reports

Control Activity.name: 1p6ijjmu70
Control Activity.description: Monthly reconciliation of intercompany balances between all entities with investigation of differences.
Control Activity.control_procedure:
1. Extract intercompany balances from all entities
2. Compare corresponding account pairs
3. Identify and investigate differences
4. Clear timing differences
5. Escalate unreconciled items
6. Sign off on reconciliation
Control Activity.evidence_requirements: Intercompany reconciliation reports, difference analysis

Control Activity.name: 1p7qh2tm9e
Control Activity.description: Review of intercompany elimination entries during consolidation to ensure completeness and accuracy.
Control Activity.control_procedure:
1. Review elimination entries generated
2. Verify all IC balances are eliminated
3. Check elimination amounts tie to reconciliations
4. Confirm no residual IC balances in consolidated
5. Document review and sign off
Control Activity.evidence_requirements: Elimination entries, consolidation package, sign-off

Risk Register Entry.name: 1paaq29444
Risk Register Entry.description: Risk that revenue is recognized in the wrong period, leading to material misstatement of financial results. Could result from improper cutoff procedures or misapplication of revenue recognition standards.

Risk Register Entry.name: 1pi4h0nmok
Risk Register Entry.description: Risk of employees submitting false or inflated expense reports for personal gain. Could include fictitious expenses, duplicate submissions, or personal expenses claimed as business.

Risk Register Entry.name: 1pj8ctp7ti
Risk Register Entry.description: Risk of fraudulent payments to fictitious vendors or altered payment details for legitimate vendors. Business email compromise (BEC) attacks are increasing this risk.

Risk Register Entry.name: 1pj8k1vdsn
Risk Register Entry.description: Risk of insufficient cash to meet operational and debt obligations. Could result from poor forecasting, customer collection issues, or unexpected expenses.

Risk Register Entry.name: 1pkl8lji2i
Risk Register Entry.description: Risk of material bad debt from customer defaults or bankruptcies. Economic downturns or industry concentration could amplify losses.

Risk Register Entry.name: 1pkh4tpd4t
Risk Register Entry.description: Risk of errors in tax returns leading to penalties, interest, or reputational damage. Complexity of multi-jurisdictional tax compliance increases this risk.

Risk Register Entry.name: 1plndo5dp6
Risk Register Entry.description: Risk of ERP or financial system downtime impacting period-end close, payment processing, or financial reporting. Extended outage could cause compliance violations.

Risk Register Entry.name: 1pl329uk4i
Risk Register Entry.description: Risk of material misstatement in inventory valuation due to obsolescence, incorrect costing, or physical count discrepancies.

Risk Register Entry.name: 1pl52cki0c
Risk Register Entry.description: Risk of unauthorized users accessing, modifying, or extracting sensitive financial data. Could lead to fraud, compliance violations, or competitive harm.

Risk Register Entry.name: 1pm1465ugf
Risk Register Entry.description: Risk of material losses from adverse foreign currency movements on international transactions, intercompany balances, or foreign subsidiary translations.

Risk Register Entry.name: 1pmge2dgvh
Risk Register Entry.description: Risk of incorrect employee payments due to system errors, unauthorized changes, or data entry mistakes. Could result in compliance violations and employee dissatisfaction.

Risk Register Entry.name: 1pm8v26gdm
Risk Register Entry.description: Risk of intentional manipulation of financial results by management to meet targets, maintain stock price, or obtain financing. Material weakness in controls.

Regulatory Feed Source.name: SEC Proposed Rules
Regulatory Feed Source.description: SEC proposed rules for public comment
